roleset.name: on bended knee
roleset.note: KNEEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'kneel' based on sentences in brown. Verbnet entry (from kneel.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: participial
example.text: ...their exquisitely graceful nude and draped torsos and the kneeling Atlantes are well preserved in their perfect proportions.

example.name: pure verbal
example.text: They will kneel and plead for Boris' leadership.
